alert.note: Alert for Adams; Cumberland (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 3:22PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN ADAMS AND SOUTH CENTRAL CUMBERLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 322 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles east of Shippensburg. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Holly Springs, Aspers, Pine Grove Furnace, Bendersville, Idaville and Gardners. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
